subproject.description: Support the resettlement and recovery of conflict-affected communities through UNDP supported Regional Mine Action Office (RMAO) staff to continue to support the Government Agents to coordinate and manage mine/explosive remnants of war (ERW) clearance and mine risk education in affected districts and International Technical Advisers (ITAs) to continue to provide technical guidance and assistance to the National Steering Committee on Mine Action (NSCMA), the RMAOs and demining operators.
